title: 25 Awwdorably Funny Memes That 100% Pass the Vibe Check
description: If you are here today, then we know for a fact that you guys know what passing the vibe check means. We know that you understand the things that really matter in life, the things that make a difference, the things that bring joy to people's lives. We know that if we tell you that starting every day with funny cat memes is of utmost impurrtance, then you would not laugh at that statement. In fact, you will understand that we are right, and you will say thank you to us for providing such important goods to you. Starting your day with silly cat memes like these - hissterical cat memes that 100% pass the vibe check means starting your day with a smile, with pawsitivity, with a nice and warm feeling in your stomach. Any day is made better when you start it like this. So, you're welcome. We are not going to say that we hope you enjoy these memes because we know that you simply will. Have a fantabulous day, y'all!
author: Mariel Ruvinsky
excerpt: 25 Awwdorably Funny Memes That 100% Pass the Vibe Check - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals
text: He is living his best life, and we will not allow anyone to judge him for it. We wish we were all as comfortable and happy as he is. To be able to live life this carefree and joyful would be a good thing for us all. He's an example is what he is.  There is no reason to prove it to anyone at this point, we think. We have seen time and time again that orange cats are beautiful and special and purrfect. Really, you should know by now that adopting an orange cat means adopting chaos into your household. And that you should 100% do it.
html:
He is living his best life, and we will not allow anyone to judge him for it. We wish we were all as comfortable and happy as he is. To be able to live life this carefree and joyful would be a good thing for us all. He's an example is what he is. 

There is no reason to prove it to anyone at this point, we think. We have seen time and time again that orange cats are beautiful and special and purrfect. Really, you should know by now that adopting an orange cat means adopting chaos into your household. And that you should 100% do it.
